name: Romeo and Juliet
description:
Welcome to Romeo and Juliet !

Romeo and Juliet  is platform game inspired classic game Mario Bros.The game's mid-1980s release served to further popularized the side-scrolling subgenre of the already popular platform video game genre of the early 1980s. The courageous Guava paste Juliet who must save the Romeo the cheese from evil savory snacks commanded by a pear-shaped, deep-fried chicken filled croquette aka Coxinha.

Guava paste Rescue creators:

* Francisca Augusto - Developer / Game Designer

* Luis Henrique Benayon - Developer / Game Designer

* Samuel Queiroz - Developer / Game Designer

* Yasmim Rodrigues - Designer

## Gameplay

The objective of the game is to defeat all of the enemies in each phase. The mechanics of Guave paste running, jumping and and find Romeu Cheese. 

## ART Concept

Romeo and Juliet is a tragedy written by William Shakespeare early in his career about two young star-crossed lovers whose deaths ultimately reconcile their feuding families. Today, the title characters are regarded as archetypal young lovers. Also, Romeo and Juliet is a traditional Brazilian dessert made with cheese and guava paste . The origin likely occurred in Minas Gerais even during the colonial period, when the Portuguese began to produce cheese in their colonies. Alternatively, the creation of dessert is attributed to the Bulgarians. So, the Shakespeare's and the traditional Brazilian dessert became mixed and the final art made Adventure Time with Finn & Jake like.
